articles.title: PM2.5 pollution in India dips by 19% between 2017 to 2022: Report
articles.description:
PM2.5 pollution in rural and urban India reduced by around 19 per cent between 2017 and 2022, according to a new analysis.
Uttar Pradesh leads the way with a 38 per cent decline in PM2.5 pollution in both urban and rural regions during the same period. On the…

articles.title: JayKay Enterprise shares soar on acquisition by subsidiary
articles.description: JayKay Enterprise Ltd’s subsidiary, JK Defence & Aerospace Ltd, has acquired a 76.41% equity stake in Allen Reinforced Plastics Private Ltd for ₹90 crore. This acquisition marks an inorganic growth move in the Defence & Aerospace sector for JayKay Enterprise.
